items.rawContent:
{
    "displayName": "$$E1D22DABK1D36A478ES9C9BEC0273299916B",
    "id": "gs.Condition",
    "group": "$$2DCE5AEAK657FA4F5BS8EC3EA543DC123D24",
    "subGroup": "$$0982629273001344698BD7512598CADED0B4",
    "isContainer": true,
    "isMainNode": true,
    "defaultValue": { "variable": { "scope": 1, "index": 0, "domain": GS.CONST.DEFAULT_DOMAIN }, "numberValue": 0, "textValue": "", "switchValue": 0, "valueType": 0, "operation": 0 },
    "quickItems": [
        {
            "label": "$$46B13E5F425044489F3B1B4865D3AD57BE2A",
            "valueFormula": "return GS.CONST.VARIABLE_VALUE_TYPES[p.valueType]",
            "attribute": "valueType",
            "identifier": "valueType",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dataSource": GS.CONST.VARIABLE_VALUE_TYPES,
            "showItems": [["numberVariable", "numberValue"], ["switchVariable", "switchValue"], ["textVariable", "textValue"]]
        },
        {
            "label": "$$8FDA6DB8K3D9DA4768SAEFEE8D5AC4132CBF",
            "identifier": "numberVariable",
            "valueFormula": "return fmtNumVar(p.variable)",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dialog": { "uid": "dialog.selectVariable", "parameters": { "dataSource": "numbers" } },
            "attribute": "variable"
        },
        {
            "label": "$$8FDA6DB8K3D9DA4768SAEFEE8D5AC4132CBF",
            "identifier": "switchVariable",
            "valueFormula": "return fmtBoolVar(p.variable)",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dialog": { "uid": "dialog.selectVariable", "parameters": { "dataSource": "booleans" } },
            "attribute": "variable"
        },
        {
            "label": "$$8FDA6DB8K3D9DA4768SAEFEE8D5AC4132CBF",
            "identifier": "textVariable",
            "valueFormula": "return fmtStrVar(p.variable)",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dialog": { "uid": "dialog.selectVariable", "parameters": { "dataSource": "strings" } },
            "attribute": "variable"
        },
        {
            "label": "$$C5EB04527677A744804A8F85744C8BE285F3",
            "valueFormula": "return GS.CONST.COMPARE_OPERATIONS[p.operation]",
            "attribute": "operation",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dataSource": GS.CONST.COMPARE_OPERATIONS
        },
        {
            "label": "$$89ECAECDK4610A4BF8SA019E8444CA45FAB6",
            "identifier": "numberValue",
            "variableButton": { "dataSource": "numbers" },
            "valueFormula": "return fmtNumVar(p.numberValue);",
            "type": "GSQStepper",
            "attribute": "numberValue",
            "defaultValue": 0,
            "minimum": -GS.CONST.MAX_NUMBER_VALUE,
            "maximum": GS.CONST.MAX_NUMBER_VALUE
        },
        {
            "label": "$$89ECAECDK4610A4BF8SA019E8444CA45FAB6",
            "identifier": "textValue",
            "valueFormula": "return fmtStrVar(p.textValue)",
            "type": "GSQTextArea",
            "multiline": false,
            "variableButton": { "dataSource": "strings" },
            "attribute": "textValue"
        },
        {
            "label": "$$89ECAECDK4610A4BF8SA019E8444CA45FAB6",
            "variableButton": { "dataSource": "booleans" },
            "valueFormula": "return isVar(p.switchValue) ? fmtBoolVar(p.switchValue) : GS.CONST.SWITCH_STATES[p.switchValue]",
            "identifier": "switchValue",
            "attribute": "switchValue",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dataSource": GS.CONST.SWITCH_STATES
        }
    ]
}
items.name: Condition
